==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|ls=psc|肉|旨|alt1=月|c1=s|c2=p|t1=meat}}.

===Etymology===
It is thought to descend from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*tsil||fat, grease}}, although the initial does not match the one of the Old Chinese reconstruction ({{zh-ref|Matisoff, STEDT}}; {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=脂
|c=zi1
|h=pfs=chṳ̂
|md=ciĕ
|mn=chi/twv:chí
|mn-t=zin1
|w=1tsr
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=
|cat=n
}}

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}
